english.Description: After completing your project, take a screenshot of your project and upload it here
english.Description2: If your teacher is in the same room as you, click the button below to let them know you are done

Maori.Title: After completing your project, take a screenshot of your project and upload it here
Maori.Description: Tukua te Whakaahua Kaupapa Ka oti to kaupapa, tangohia he whakaahua o to kaupapa ka tuku ake ki konei
Maori.Description2: Mena kei te ruma kotahi to kaiako ki a koe, pawhiria te paatene i raro nei kia mohio ratou kua oti koe

Korean.Description: 프로젝트를 완료한 후 프로젝트의 스크린샷을 찍어 여기에 업로드하세요.
Korean.Description2: 선생님이 같은 방에 있는 경우 아래 버튼을 클릭하여 완료되었음을 알립니다.

Chinese.Description: 完成项目后，截取项目的屏幕截图并上传到此处
Chinese.Description2: 如果您的老师和您在同一个房间，请单击下面的按钮让他们知道您已完成
